question: Match Column-I with Column-II and choose the correct option given below:
Column-I (Bacteria): a. Coccus, b. Bacillus, c. Vibrium, d. Spirillum
Column-II (Shape): i. Rod-shaped, ii. Spiral, iii. Spherical, iv. Comma-shaped
explanation: Coccus is spherical (iii), Bacillus is rod-shaped (i), Vibrium (Vibrio) is comma-shaped (iv), Spirillum is spiral (ii) [cite: 318-336, 478].
